title: Intermittent Test Failure in ValidatorApiHandler
body:
The tests below in `ValidatorApiHandlerTest` fail intermittently:
- `getDuties_shouldReturnDutiesForMixOfKnownAndUnknownValidators`
- `getAttestationDuties_shouldReturnDutiesAndSkipMissingValidators`
- `getDuties_shouldReturnDutiesForKnownValidator`
Can we have a link to the failure or at least the failure output?

https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/PegaSysEng/teku/7380/workflows/c468cbd1-6213-415c-be8a-1662a3861416/jobs/46436
```
getDuties_shouldReturnDutiesForMixOfKnownAndUnknownValidators() - tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.ValidatorApiHandlerTest
java.lang.AssertionError: 
Expecting:
  <[ValidatorDuties{publicKey=0x8f5f289f8ae538eca9f393fd7ed1a5432ba4c145b700075d1a8ea9530ec8cba3b91511e78662d0f2bed026a1b86d6d2b, duties=Optional[Duties{validatorIndex=3, attestationCommitteeIndex=0, attestationCommitteePosition=2, aggregatorModulo=1, blockProposalSlots=[], attestationSlot=55}]},
    ValidatorDuties{publicKey=0x90ccaec55ccbffde63bf2dffbd12e821fdbb7806bf13394c6bba7eaff834d7ed1e6b7916820c9ff36d9ea7a44de27303, duties=Optional.empty},
```

@kcharbo3 Great find - you're spot on correct.  The best fix will be to add an `@AfterAll` to `PerformanceTrackerTest` which calls `Constants.setConstants("minimal")` which will ensure all the constant values are reset, including `SLOTS_PER_EPOCH`.

If you raise a PR, CircleCI will automatically run the build for you.

Awesome thanks! Just raised the PR: #2901 
Will check to ensure that this fixes the unit test failures.
